name: ARCADE HUSTLE
description:
Choose between randomly generated options in order to get as much money as possible before you run out of health. Increase your multiplier to earn more money per option and your income to create a steady flow of cash.

Every 20 turns, you chose one of three items to obtain in order to assist you in your money making adventure. There are 100 unique items in total.

Compete to collect as much money as you can to earn the top spot on the leaderboard.

Play using the mouse.
